content:
# We successfully harvested 10 iron ore, and our inventory now contains:
# - 8 wood
# - 10 coal
# - 5 stone
# - 10 iron ore
# 
# The furnace is still present on the map but is showing "NO_INGREDIENTS", indicating that it has no iron ore to smelt. It has produced 5 iron plates so far.

# Now, let's insert the iron ore back into the furnace to resume the smelting process.
insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, furnace, quantity=10)  # Insert all 10 iron ore into the furnace
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, furnace, quantity=5)  # Reinserting coal to keep the furnace fueled

# Check the furnace status and inventory after the insertions
furnace_inventory = inspect_inventory(furnace)
print(f"Furnace Inventory after adding resources: {furnace_inventory}")
print(f"Furnace Status after adding resources: {furnace.status}")  # Check status again

# Lastly, I will wait for a while again to see if more iron plates are produced.
for _ in range(30):  # Wait for up to 30 seconds
    furnace_inv = inspect_inventory(furnace)
    if furnace_inv[Prototype.IronPlate] > 5:  # Check if any additional iron plates have been produced
        break
    sleep(1)

print(f"Final Inventory after smelting again: {inspect_inventory()}")
